page.title: 06POPULATION MOVEMENT IN SHAW
page.content:
{An Interview
We interviewed my mum and grandmother.The first question was "Why did you move house?"My mum said it was because she got married and my grandmother said she moved because her father went into business in Rochdale.The second question was "How many places have you lived in?"My mum said she only moved once and Gran said she moved 6 times.We asked if they liked it where they used to live and they both said yes.The last question was "Whereabouts were you born?" My mum was born in Rochdale and Gran was born at Greengate in Yeadon.
